kidsExercises.title: Find Your Animal Family!
kidsExercises.question: Which animal could be your family's special totem?
kidsExercises.correctAnswer: Any animal - all families have special animals!

intrinsicFeedback.success: Wow! Every animal family is special and amazing!
intrinsicFeedback.encouragement: Your family animal makes you part of a big, loving family!

activities.coloring: Color your family animal and make it beautiful!
activities.sounds: Make the sound your family animal makes!

kidsExercises.title: Animal Sounds Game
kidsExercises.question: What sound does a Shumba (lion) make?

intrinsicFeedback.success: Great job! You know animal sounds!
intrinsicFeedback.encouragement: Animals are amazing friends in Zimbabwe!

activities.acting: Act like each animal with sounds and movements!
activities.drawing: Draw the animals making their sounds!

kidsExercises.title: Build Your Family Tree
kidsExercises.question: Who are the special people in your family?

familyMembers.role: Takes care of you and loves you
Takes care of you and loves you

intrinsicFeedback.success: Beautiful family tree! Your family is so special!
intrinsicFeedback.encouragement: Every person in your family loves you very much!

activities.drawing: Draw pictures of your family members
activities.photos: Look at family photos and practice names
activities.stories: Ask family members to tell you stories

kidsExercises.title: Greeting Family Game
kidsExercises.question: How do you greet your grandpa in Shona?

intrinsicFeedback.success: Perfect greeting! Your family will be so proud!
intrinsicFeedback.encouragement: Respectful greetings show you care about family!

kidsExercises.title: Make Pretend Sadza
kidsExercises.question: Let's cook sadza together! What do we need?

intrinsicFeedback.success: You're a great cook! Sadza brings families together!
intrinsicFeedback.encouragement: Sharing food shows love in Zimbabwe!

activities.pretend_cooking: Use play dough to make pretend sadza
activities.real_cooking: Help a grown-up make real sadza
activities.sharing: Practice offering food to others politely

kidsExercises.title: Magic Polite Words
kidsExercises.question: What magic word do you say when someone gives you food?

intrinsicFeedback.success: You know the magic words! You're so polite!
intrinsicFeedback.encouragement: Saying thank you makes everyone happy!

activities.practice: Practice saying thank you in different situations
activities.role_play: Take turns giving and receiving with thank you

kidsExercises.title: Mbira Music and Dance
kidsExercises.question: Can you dance to the beautiful mbira music?

musicElements.movement: Move your thumbs like playing mbira
Pat your hands like playing drums

intrinsicFeedback.success: You're a wonderful dancer! Music makes everyone happy!
intrinsicFeedback.encouragement: Every person can dance - there's no wrong way!

activities.making_instruments: Make shakers with beans and containers
activities.dancing: Create your own dance moves to mbira music

kidsExercises.title: Make Your Own Hosho Shakers
kidsExercises.question: Let's make music instruments like in Zimbabwe!

intrinsicFeedback.success: You made your own Zimbabwean instrument!

activities.decorating: Make your shakers colorful and beautiful
activities.rhythm_games: Play rhythm games with your new shakers
activities.family_band: Start a family band with homemade instruments

kidsExercises.title: How Can I Help?
kidsExercises.question: Your friend drops their toys. What do you do?
kidsExercises.correctAnswer: Help pick up the toys and say 'Ndinokubatsira' (I will help you)

options.result: Your friend feels happy and grateful!
Your friend feels sad and alone
options.feedback: In Zimbabwe, we help each other
That's not kind. We should help instead

intrinsicFeedback.success: You have a kind heart! Helping others is wonderful!
intrinsicFeedback.encouragement: When we help others, everyone feels good!

kidsExercises.title: Sharing Makes Friends
kidsExercises.question: You have 3 cookies. How do you share with 2 friends?
kidsExercises.correctAnswer: Give each friend 1 cookie and keep 1 for yourself

intrinsicFeedback.success: You're great at sharing! That makes strong friendships!
intrinsicFeedback.encouragement: Sharing shows you care about others!

activities.practice: Practice sharing real snacks with family
activities.kindness: Think of other ways to be kind

kidsExercises.title: Make Party Decorations
kidsExercises.question: Let's make colorful decorations for a celebration!

intrinsicFeedback.success: Your decorations are beautiful! Celebrations are more fun with you!
intrinsicFeedback.encouragement: You help make special times even more special!

activities.crafting: Make real decorations for next family celebration
activities.planning: Help plan a small family celebration

kidsExercises.title: Happy Celebration Songs
kidsExercises.question: Let's sing a happy song for celebrations!

songs.title: Welcome Baby Song
songs.lyrics:
Mwana mutsva akasvika! (New baby has arrived!)
Tinofara! Tinofara! (We are happy! We are happy!)
songs.actions: Clap hands and rock like holding a baby

songs.title: Happy Family Song
songs.lyrics:
Mhuri yangu ndinoyida! (I love my family!)
Tinofara pamwe chete! (We are happy together!)
songs.actions: Point to family members and hug

intrinsicFeedback.success: You sing beautifully! Music makes celebrations special!
intrinsicFeedback.encouragement: Your voice brings joy to everyone!

activities.creating: Make up your own celebration songs
activities.performing: Perform songs at the next family gathering
